description: Synthetic dataset for testing smoothing basis projection. Answers are grouped by topic (similar embeddings), but each cluster has only 1-2 questions (sparse).

clusters.answer: NullPointerException occurs when accessing methods or fields on a null reference. Always check if object is null before use: if (obj != null) { obj.method(); }
NullReferenceException in C# happens when dereferencing null. Use null-conditional operator: obj?.Method() or null checks before access.
TypeError: NoneType has no attribute occurs when calling methods on None in Python. Check with: if x is not None: x.method()
questions: Why do I get NoneType error?

clusters.answer: Read file in Python: with open('file.txt', 'r') as f: content = f.read(). Using 'with' ensures file is properly closed.
questions: How to read a file in Python?

clusters.answer: Read file in Java: Files.readString(Path.of('file.txt')) for Java 11+, or BufferedReader with FileReader for older versions.
Read file in C#: File.ReadAllText('file.txt') for simple cases, or StreamReader for large files with buffering.
Python for loop: for item in collection: process(item). Use enumerate() for index: for i, item in enumerate(collection).
Java for-each loop: for (Type item : collection) { process(item); }. Traditional: for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {}
C# foreach loop: foreach (var item in collection) { Process(item); }. LINQ alternative: collection.ForEach(x => Process(x));
Python async: async def fetch(): return await http_client.get(url). Run with asyncio.run(fetch()). Use gather() for parallel.
questions: How does async work in Python?

clusters.answer: Java async: CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> compute()).thenApply(result -> process(result)). Use join() to wait.
C# async/await: async Task<T> FetchAsync() { return await httpClient.GetAsync(url); }. Don't block with .Result, use await.
Python JSON: import json; data = json.loads(json_string); json_out = json.dumps(data, indent=2). Use json.load(file) for files.
Java JSON with Jackson: ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(); MyClass obj = mapper.readValue(json, MyClass.class);
C# JSON: JsonSerializer.Deserialize<MyClass>(json) for System.Text.Json, or JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<T>() for Newtonsoft.
Python exceptions: try: risky_code() except ValueError as e: handle(e) finally: cleanup(). Use specific exception types.
Java exceptions: try { riskyCode(); } catch (IOException e) { handle(e); } finally { cleanup(); }. Checked vs unchecked.
C# exceptions: try { RiskyCode(); } catch (Exception ex) when (ex is IOException) { Handle(ex); } finally { Cleanup(); }
